data.prayer: Lord, for the leaders in the county of Dhaulpur, let the eyes of their hearts be enlightened in order that they may know the hope to which they are called.
data.verse: I pray that the eyes of your heart may be enlightened in order that you may know the hope to which he has called you, the riches of his glorious inheritance in his holy people, and his incomparably great power for us who believe.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dhaulpur, Rajasthan, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 13,272 believers in the county of Dhaulpur the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Dhaulpur with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Dhaulpur, Rajasthan, India to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Jat Dalal (Muslim traditions) people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Dhaulpur.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 13,272 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Dhaulpur.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Father, let the threatened of Dhaulpur, Rajasthan, India know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

location.name: Dhaulpur
location.people_groups_list: Jat Dhankar, Brahmin Sankliwal, Brahmin Sikhwal, Jat Dehia (Sikh traditions), Brahmin Srimali
